name: The House (itch) (Klaim)
description:
The House - v0.5 Alpha

Consider giving us FEEDBACK to make the game better!

  • First person, low-key horror. Trigger Warning: body horror
  • Prefer the downloadable desktop versions below to the web version for better performance
  • Note for MacOS players: to download the desktop version, please use the itch.io application to not have security issues.
    • Warning: there is a bug in WebKit that makes MacOS browsers not work with the web version. It should be fixed by an update of the OS or browsers later, but at the moment of writing this line the web version doesnt run on MacOs.
  • Requirements: keyboard and mouse
  • Credits: see the Credits button in-game
  • Made in HomeTeam Gamedev (Outpost) 
  • Made with Godot Engine

What is missing:

  • Some 3D models are missing and replaced by placeholders (red blocks, body parts, etc.)
  • Some sounds are not plugged in yet
  • The music at the beginning of the game is a draft
  • Performance issues are planned to be fixed soon
  • Credits are not filled yet
  • Menus and options are not in-there yet
